rows.label: qst200803_0010
rows.name: ...Hotaru? What's wrong with that tree?

rows.label: qst200803_0020
rows.name: ...This child is injured.

rows.label: qst200803_0030
rows.name: Injured?

rows.label: qst200803_0040
rows.name:
Yeah, she got hurt when we were
fighting those guys just now...

rows.label: qst200803_0050
rows.name:
It's nothing to worry about,
is it? It'll heal on its own.

rows.label: qst200803_0060
rows.name: These children are alive too.

rows.label: qst200803_0070
rows.name:
If we just leave her like this,
she might wither and die.

rows.label: qst200803_0080
rows.name: How can you say that...?

rows.label: qst200803_0090
rows.name: ...Ah, no, I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst200803_0100
rows.name: I didn't mean it like that...

rows.label: qst200803_0110
rows.name:
But... Even if she's injured,
what can we do, mo?

rows.label: qst200803_0120
rows.name: ...Can you heal her?

rows.label: qst200803_0130
rows.name: Hmm... I won't know unless I check.

rows.label: qst200803_0140
rows.name:
But I think it'll be alright
if there's some medicine.

rows.label: qst200803_0150
rows.name: Medicine...

rows.label: qst200803_0160
rows.name:
In that case, we should
be able to prepare some.

rows.label: qst200803_0170
rows.name:
Alright, then. Let's
help that great tree.

rows.label: qst200803_0180
rows.name: Really? You'll help me?

rows.label: qst200803_0190
rows.name:
Yeah. If this tree were to die, there
would be people who would be sad.

rows.label: qst200803_0200
rows.name: This is also a form of helping people.

rows.label: qst200803_0210
rows.name: Is that alright with you, Hotaru?

rows.label: qst200803_0220
rows.name: Yes. Thank you, everyone.

rows.label: qst200803_0230
rows.name: Well then, I'll go check on this child.
